Reference

All functions

activate() deactivate()

Activate touchstone environment

benchmark_ls()

List which benchmarks were recorded

benchmark_read()

Read benchmarks

benchmark_run_ref()

Run a benchmark for git refs

benchmark_write()

Write a benchmark

benchmarks_analyze()

Turn raw benchmark results into text and figures

local_touchstone_libpath()

Set Library Path

path_pinned_asset()

Get path to asset

pin_assets()

Pin asset directory

pr_comment

Modifying the PR Comment

ref_get_or_fail()

Get the ref from the environment variable or fail if not set

refs_install()

Install branches

run_script()

Sources a script

dir_touchstone() touchstone_clear() path_pr_comment()

Touchstone managers

touchstone_script

The script for benchmarking

use_touchstone()

Initiate touchstone
